headline.main: LIFE ON CORREGIDOR TOLD BY MRS. SAYRE; Safe in San Francisco, Wife of High Commissioner Says Women Were 'in Way'  NORMALCY' HERE A SHOCK We Must Send Help Quickly to Men Giving All, She Tells a Press Conference

lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, April 1 -- Mrs. Francis B. Sayre, wife of the High Commissioner to the Philippines, gave an account today of life on the island fortress of Corregidor.
abstract: Mrs F B Sayre on Corregidor life
snippet: SAN FRANCISCO, April 1 -- Mrs. Francis B. Sayre, wife of the High Commissioner to the Philippines, gave an account today of life on the island fortress of Corregidor....

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
